predicate.note: Frames file for 'profess' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet class profess 29.4, no mention of other members. Comparison to 'declare'.

example.name: basic transitive
example.text: He also professes an ``evangelical'' fervor to develop a corporate culture that rewards managers who produce and where decision-making is shared.
example.arg: an ``evangelical'' fervor to develop a corporate culture that rewards managers who produce and where decision-making is shared
